review: most friendly doctor we have ever met. Visited him for my 5 days old baby with bacterial infection. It was a panic situation for us being parents for first time. He explained the problem and treatment he was planning and answered to our queries very patiently. No extra tests, only what was required. We followed whatever he suggested and now our baby is absolutely fine. Thank you sir for holding our hands during those difficult days.
I recommend the doctor. He friendliness, Explanation of the health issue, Treatment satisfacion, I am very much happy, hear patient problem carefully.  I always recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is very friendly and explains all our doubts patiently. He explained very well on how to burp the baby.

My son had pain in ear but no fever or running nose. Doctor made quick diagnosis and suggested medicines. Made the kid comfortable while checking. Kid was ok and so I was happy. - Hospital changed the Doctor to Dr. Chiraag as Dr. Saravanan was not available at the scheduled time.
